ComicInfo.Title: Mourning at Dawn!
ComicInfo.Summary: Mourning at Dawn!: Daimon continues his battle with Madame Swabada while Detective Quinn, Katherine Reynolds and Christine Sandt uncover more information on the gypsy fortune teller.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 20:03:20. [CVDB132445] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:54:08. [Issue ID 28467]
